# AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Element

**Type Alias**

A key-value pair from the collection consisting of the name of an animation and the animation itself.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Element = (key: String, value: AnimationResource)
```

## Accessing animations

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a single animation in the collection with a key.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses animations in the collection within an index range.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a single animation in the collection at an index.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.SubSequence**: A sequence that represents a contiguous subrange of animations in the collection.

items.description: Accesses a single animation in the collection with a key.
items.name: subscript(_:)

items.description: Accesses animations in the collection within an index range.
items.name: subscript(_:)

items.description: Accesses a single animation in the collection at an index.
items.name: subscript(_:)

items.description: A sequence that represents a contiguous subrange of animations in the collection.
